sentences.en: A state - owned enterprise is big and well - off .
sentences.cn: 国营 企业家 业大.

sentences.en: an enterprise with a turnover of $26 billion
commercial enterprises such as banks and food manufacturers
sentences.cn: 银行和食品制造厂等商业企业

sentences.en: Enterprise must have a reservoir of cheap labour.
sentences.cn: 企业应储备廉价的劳动力.

sentences.en: He is a man of great enterprise.
He is bound to succeed in his enterprise.
sentences.cn: 他在事业上一定会成功.

sentences.en: He is still involved in voluntary work promoting local enterprise.
sentences.cn: 他仍在从事促进当地创业的志愿者工作。

sentences.en: Horse breeding is indeed a risky enterprise.
sentences.cn: 养马确实是个有风险的营生。

sentences.en: It seemed a singularly ill-judged enterprise for Truman to undertake.
sentences.cn: 这对于杜鲁门来说似乎是一项特别不明智的事业。

sentences.en: Speaking generally, the space enterprise has served astronomy well.
sentences.cn: 总的说来，航空企业很好地促进了天文学的发展。

sentences.en: state/public enterprise (=one owned by the government)
sentences.cn: 国有企业/公共事业单位

sentences.en: The boss has put all his money into that speculative enterprise.
sentences.cn: 这个老板把他的全部财产都投到那个投机事业中.
这家企业的远景极其美好.

sentences.en: The funds needed will mainly be drawn from accumulation within the enterprise.
sentences.cn: 所需资金主要取给于企业内部的积累.

sentences.en: The programme is a joint enterprise with the London Business School.
sentences.cn: 这一计划是与伦敦商学院的合作项目。

sentences.en: They were rightly praised for their thrift and enterprise.
sentences.cn: 他们勤俭节约，积极进取，得到了当之无愧的赞扬。

sentences.en: We’re looking for young people with enterprise and creativity.
sentences.cn: 例句：我们在寻找有事业心和创造力的年轻人。

words.tran_cn: 有事业心的；有进取心的；有魄力的；有胆量的

phrases.tran_cn: 龙头企业；（行业中的）龙头老大

trans.tran_cn: 公司，企（事）业单位，事业，创业，企业发展，事业心，创业精神
